add_subdirectory(dr_libs EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
add_subdirectory(kissfft EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
add_subdirectory(fdk-aac EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
add_subdirectory(portaudio EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
add_subdirectory(libmp3lame EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
if(BUILD_TESTING)
    add_subdirectory(googletest EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
endif()

add_library(Ring-Buffer INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(Ring-Buffer INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Ring-Buffer/")
